decks.notes: This deck focuses on aggressive plays through a combination of powerful creatures and disruptive spells. Using a mix of low-cost creatures like Raffine and Dennick, alongside Thalia to slow down opponents, the deck aims to put pressure on the opponent quickly. Sheoldred provides a big threat that can swing the game in your favor, while cards like Go for the Throat help deal with opposing creatures. The mana base is designed to support the aggressive strategy with a mix of colored sources to ensure consistent plays each turn.

This deck focuses on controlling the game through various spells and creatures in order to outlast and outmaneuver the opponent. It uses cards like Ossification and Lay Down Arms to incapacitate the opponent's creatures, while Wedding Announcement and The Restoration of Eiganjo provide defense and card advantage. The deck also includes powerful creatures like Elspeth Resplendent and The Wandering Emperor to close out the game. With a strong emphasis on defense and resource management, this mono white control deck aims to disrupt the opponent's strategy and establish dominance on the battlefield.

The main focus of this deck is to control the game using a combination of creature removal, creature buffs, and land destruction. By utilizing cards like Reckoner Bankbuster and Lay Down Arms, the deck seeks to neutralize opponent threats while building up its own board presence with creatures like Serra Paragon and Intrepid Adversary. The inclusion of cards like The Restoration of Eiganjo and Destroy Evil provide additional removal options, while Field of Ruin and Demolition Field help disrupt opponent's mana base. Overall, the deck aims to outvalue and outlast opponents through careful resource management and control.

This Rakdos Control deck focuses on using various removal spells to control the board while using powerful creatures like Sheoldred, the Apocalypse and Graveyard Trespasser to pressure the opponent. Gix's Command and Fable of the Mirror-Breaker provide versatility and card advantage, while Reckoner Bankbuster and Bloodtithe Harvester help disrupt the opponent's strategy. The deck also includes cards like Duress and Invoke Despair to disrupt the opponent's hand, ensuring that the control aspect is maintained throughout the game. The mana base allows for consistent casting of spells and creatures.

The main concept of this Selesnya Aggro deck is to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of aggressive creatures and support spells. By quickly putting pressure on the opponent with cards like Crawling Chorus, Jawbone Duelist, and Bloated Contaminator, the deck aims to control the board and deal damage efficiently. Additionally, cards like Tyvar's Stand and Skrelv's Hive provide additional support and versatility to help maintain board presence. Overall, the deck focuses on quick, efficient aggression to outpace the opponent and secure victory.

The main concept of this Mono Black Aggro deck is to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of aggressive creatures like Phyrexian Fleshgorger and Tenacious Underdog, backed up by removal spells like Go for the Throat and Cut Down to control the board. Utilizing powerful creatures like Graveyard Trespasser and Sheoldred, the Apocalypse, the deck aims to quickly deplete the opponent's life total and secure victory. The inclusion of cards like Razorlash Transmogrant and Gix, Yawgmoth Praetor adds versatility and flexibility to deal with various threats.

The primary focus of this deck is to utilize aggressive Mono Blue creatures and spells to control the board and quickly overwhelm the opponent. By playing efficient creatures like Haughty Djinn and Tolarian Terror, along with disruptive spells like Essence Scatter and Negate, the deck aims to establish an early board advantage and maintain momentum through card draw and countering opponent's threats. With a streamlined approach to aggression and control, this deck aims to consistently apply pressure and disrupt the opponent's game plan until victory is achieved.

The main focus of this deck is to maintain control over the game by utilizing removal spells and creatures that disrupt your opponent's game plan. By using cards like Go for the Throat, Invoke Despair, and Duress, along with powerful creatures like Sheoldred, the Apocalypse and Graveyard Trespasser, you aim to keep your opponent on the back foot while you gain the upper hand. The deck also includes some land destruction and lifegain options to further solidify your control over the game. With this deck, you aim to outlast and outmaneuver your opponent to secure victory.

The deck focuses on utilizing a combination of removal spells, discard effects, and powerful creatures to control the game and dominate the battlefield. It aims to disrupt opponents' strategies with cards like Duress and Invoke Despair while efficiently dealing with threats using spells like Abrade and Go for the Throat. The deck also includes powerful finishers like Sheoldred, the Apocalypse and Graveyard Trespasser to close out games. Overall, the deck seeks to maintain control of the game and outvalue opponents with its strong card choices and strategic gameplay.

The main idea of this Selesnya Aggro deck is to overwhelm the opponent with efficient and aggressive creatures while also gaining value from enchantments and spells that support the game plan. By utilizing cards like Jukai Naturalist, Generous Visitor, and Katilda, Dawnhart Martyr, the deck aims to establish board presence quickly and put pressure on the opponent. Additionally, cards such as Teachings of the Kirin and The Restoration of Eiganjo provide additional value and protection for the creatures. The deck also includes a few utility spells like Commune with Spirits and Ossification to further support the aggressive strategy.

The main concept of this Selesnya Aggro deck is to overwhelm the opponent with a fast and aggressive creature strategy. By using cards like Crawling Chorus, Slaughter Singer, and Venerated Rotpriest, you can quickly build a strong board presence and put pressure on your opponent. Additionally, cards like Destroy Evil and Annex Sentry help to control the board and maintain your advantage. With a mix of powerful creatures and support spells, this deck aims to dominate the battlefield and secure a quick victory.

The deck focuses on aggressively building a board presence with a mixture of creatures that have various abilities to disrupt the opponent's strategy. It also includes removal spells to deal with threats and protect its own creatures. The mana base is carefully crafted to ensure consistent access to the different colors needed for the spells and abilities in the deck. Overall, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a fast and disruptive strategy that puts pressure on them from the early turns of the game.
